item.title: Map Pool
item.description: A map pool will plot multiple maps in the same plot and generate pooled statistics across these maps. The maps that go into a pool are specified by their ‘map condition’. In a normal map plot, the X-axis is often session or days. In a pooled plot, the X-axis is defined by each sessions ‘session condition’.

item.title: Fitting segments in Fiji
item.description: Line segments are fit in FIJI using Map Manager specified control points.

item.title: User files
item.description: Please see the Map Manager Options Panel. User files have been depreciated.

item.title: Time Series Panel
item.description: The Map Manager time-series panel provides an interface to load, save and browse Map Manager time-series (maps). Open the time-series panel using the menu ‘MapManager - Time Series’

item.title: Stack plot
item.description: A stack plot shows a value/statistic for all 3D annotations in a single stack. Each point is a value/statistic for one 3D annotation in the stack.

item.title: Making a map
Layout panel
item.description: The layout panel provides an interface to tweak Igor plots.

item.title: Database overview
item.description: Map Manager builds a database of 3D objects and line segments within a single stack. Stacks and their associated 3D objects and line segments can then be connected together into a time-series with a map.

item.title: Contrast panel
Stack Browser
Annotating a stack
item.description: This describes a workflow for annotating 3D points in a single stack. Please see making a map to collect a sequence of stacks into a timeseries map.
